survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of networking opportunities at professional conferences to improve future event planning.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities at the conference?

questions.question_text: Which networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse participation.

script.question_text: Which networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Provide clear numerical ranges for actionable insights.

script.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make at the conference?

questions.question_text: What was the primary barrier to effective networking at the conference?
answer_options: Lack of diverse attendees in my field
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with open-text follow-up for nuanced feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice) with conditional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What was the primary barrier to effective networking at the conference?
answer_options: Lack of diverse attendees in my field

questions.question_text: Please specify the primary barrier to effective networking if you selected 'Other' above.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q4 is answered with 'Other (please specify)'.
questions.client_notes: Open-text field to capture unique barriers not listed.

script.question_text: Please specify the primary barrier to effective networking if you selected 'Other' above.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q4 is answered with 'Other (please specify)'.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to attend future networking events organized by this conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure intent.

script.question_text: How likely are you to attend future networking events organized by this conference?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future conference networking sessions?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future conference networking sessions?

questions.question_text: Did you use the conference app or online platform for networking purposes?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to assess digital tool usage.

script.question_text: Did you use the conference app or online platform for networking purposes?

questions.question_text: If you used the conference app or online platform, how would you rate its effectiveness for networking?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q8 is answered with 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: If you used the conference app or online platform, how would you rate its effectiveness for networking?
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q8 is answered with 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: What features would improve the conference app or online platform for networking?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q8 is answered with 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Open-text field to gather specific feature requests.

script.question_text: What features would improve the conference app or online platform for networking?
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q8 is answered with 'Yes'.
